title: useful toolbox for sociologists
text: useful functions author package package contains functions customized author’s workflow, may unuseful lot users. package suddenly modified author’s convinience.

title: useful toolbox for sociologists
text: Now, package contains 10 functions.

title: useful toolbox for sociologists
text: function makes cross table molded gt package. Pipe friendly. can use NSE(adopted Tidyverse). Depends dplyr tidyr forcats purrr rlang stringr janitor vcd gt kamaken. .data: input data.frame .x: first variable row names table. .y: second variable columns table. cramer: TRUE, calculates value cramer’s V. default TRUE. p.value: TRUE, calculates p value chi-squared test. default TRUE. adjres: TRUE, calculates adjusted residual shows results chi-square residual tests. default FALSE. example
code: # data from ggplot2 diamonds %>%    my_cross(cut, clarity, cramer = TRUE, p.value = TRUE)

title: useful toolbox for sociologists
text: function visualizes cross table. Able use syntax my_cross. Depends dplyr forcats purrr rlang stringr janitor ggplot2 scales .data: input data.frame .x: first variable .y: second variable example
code: # data from ggplot2 diamonds %>%    my_cross_plot(cut, clarity, .text = TRUE, .text_color = 'white', .text_size = 4, .pvalue = TRUE)+   theme_classic()

title: Generate a contingency table. — my_cross
text: Generate contingency table.

title: Generate a contingency table. — my_cross
code: my_cross(.data, .x, .y, cramer = TRUE, p.value = TRUE, adjres = FALSE)

title: Generate a contingency table. — my_cross
text: .data input tibble data.frame .x first variable row names table .y second variable columns table cramer TRUE, calculates value cramer's V. default TRUE p.value TRUE, calculates p value chi-squared test. default TRUE adjres TRUE, calculates adjusted residual shows results chi-square residual tests. default FALSE

what: Generate a plot converted from a contingency table. — my_cross_plot
title: Generate a plot converted from a contingency table. — my_cross_plot
text: Generate plot converted contingency table.

title: Generate a plot converted from a contingency table. — my_cross_plot
code: my_cross_plot(   .data,   .x,   .y,   strata = NULL,   row_percent = TRUE,   text_size = 4,   p.value = FALSE )

title: Generate a plot converted from a contingency table. — my_cross_plot
text: .data input tibble data.frame .x first variable row names table .y second variable columns table row_percent TRUE, shows row percent text, default TRUE text_size size text p.value TRUE, calculates p value chi-squared test. default TRUE

what:
Useful short cut for poLCA::poLCA.
you get a result table for reporting with the other functions like poLCA_check_class or poLCA_BLRT. — poLCA_result
title:
Useful short cut for poLCA::poLCA.
you get a result table for reporting with the other functions like poLCA_check_class or poLCA_BLRT. — poLCA_result
text: Useful short cut poLCA::poLCA. get result table reporting functions like poLCA_check_class poLCA_BLRT.

title:
Useful short cut for poLCA::poLCA.
you get a result table for reporting with the other functions like poLCA_check_class or poLCA_BLRT. — poLCA_result
code: poLCA_result(   formula,   data,   nclass,   maxiter = 5000,   nrep = 1,   reorder_with = "class prop",   reorder_outcome = 1,   reorder_decreasing = TRUE,   verbose = TRUE )
